segments.text: I see the kitchen, brightened by the sun streaming in through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting and tranquil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, there's a tension that makes my stomach turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so fixated on that plate; it’s almost mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I feel this anger bubbling up inside as I notice the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not see the mess forming?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy, oh, he’s climbing so recklessly!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches for those cookies, it’s like watching an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up at him, her hand outstretched, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sometimes, I wonder if they realize how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
